!Pathfinder Worker Daytime Zaken is another aspect of Zaken. Unlike his nighttime counterpart, he hides himself because he knows he is weak... But there is a way to find him. Light a candle on a barrel and it will show you the way. But be careful! The candlelight may also alert his subordinates to your location. Compared to Nighttime Zaken, Daytime Zaken is not that strong -- you should be able to attack him with a combined force of 1 to 3 parties [npc_%objectId%_request_dayzaken|Accept the battle with daytime Zaken]
